nodes.bodyText: Please move case to brand new test to not conflict with existing tests.
Ok, I've reinstated the original tests and added new tests with a separate input file
i see we have 3 new tests now when I was only expecting 1. Is all of them needed for the pitest lines?

You're right, on further testing I found that not all the tests are necessary. Originally I just made a copy of the 3 modified tests, but the first and third don't actually contribute to killing the pitest mutations.
I'll remove the 2 redundant tests.
